lyrics: Yogindranam Tsa Yogindra Guruunam Gurave Namah
Mrityo Mrimrityu Svarupena Mrityu Samsara Khandana
Kalad Atita Kalastha Kalakala Namostu Te
Gunisha Gunananam Bija Gunananam Gurave Namah
Itat Stutwa Saschavam Natwa Purastasthau Munishvarah
Asatena Kritam Stotram Bhaktiyuktisch Ya Pathayet
Sa Labhed Aischnavam Putram Gjnatinam Sacharajitavanam
Daridro Bhaved Dhanadhyo Muko Bhavati Panditah
Abhagyo Labhate Bhagyayam Sushilam Cha Pativratam
Iha Loke Sukham Bhuktva Yatyante Saschavasannidham
Idam Stotram Pura Dattam Brahmana Cha Prachetasay
